title: HTML+CSS Level 8 — Flexbox Layout
concept: Create layouts using flexbox for alignment.

challenges.title: Q1: Horizontal Navigation Bar
challenges.description: Create a horizontal navigation bar with 3–4 links (Home, About, Contact, etc.). Use flexbox to space the items evenly across the width.
challenges.outputDescription: A simple nav bar with evenly spaced items.
examples: Use display: flex and justify-content: space-around or space-between.
challenges.starterCode: Home About Contact

challenges.title: Q2: Card Grid with Flexbox
challenges.description: Create a container with 3 cards inside (divs). Use flexbox so that cards appear in a row on wide screens and wrap to the next line when screen is narrow.
examples: Use flex-wrap: wrap and a max-width on cards.
